properties.name: Esfordi deposit, Bafq County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Esfordi deposit, Bafq County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Apatite-magnetite deposit, consisting of a funnel-shaped ore body. The Esfordi apatite-magnetite deposit, the P-richest deposit in the Bafq district, is hosted by Early Cambrian rhyolitic volcanics intercalated with shallow-water sedimentary rocks.[...

Yakshawa deposit, Bukan County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran
